professional: Full Stack Developer, Mobile & Web Expert
overview: Experienced IT Specialist with a strong background in designing, developing, and maintaining computer systems for a diverse business clientele.  5+ years of blockchain development experience includes 20+ valuable Ethereum and Solana blockchain projects. 7+ years of web development experience using JavaScript frameworks includes 30+ valuable web projects.

description: Developed a web UI of DEX platform for crypto trading using ReactJS.
Used Redux as state management, Tailwindcss and MUI for UI styling.
Tested the UI using Jest framework.
Interacted with blockchain using ethers module.
Built the smart contracts by solidity to buy, sell and auction NFTs on the platform.
Took part in the development of UI using ReactJS.
Integrated with 3rd party APIs such as IPFS, Arweave and Fleek.
Designed and maintained front end for web and mobile applications by using AngularJS/TypeScript.
Wrote unit tests to improve code predictability and documentation.
